There is no caffe2 folder in /home/mkyang/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ and /usr/local.
But I find caffe2 in /usr/local/include/ and /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/.

My installation process is:

> mkdir build && cd build
> cmake -DCUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/local/cudnn-v6.0-for-cuda8.0/include -DCUDNN_LIBRARY=/usr/local/cudnn-v6.0-for-cuda8.0/lib64/libcudnn.so -DUSE_NATIVE_ARCH=ON ..
> sudo make install -j16

I try to remove these paths in $PATH, $LD_LIBRARY_PATH, $PYTHONPATH, but still failed with the same errors.

I tried both https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2 and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch, but the same errors.

There is no `caffe2` folder in `/home/mkyang/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/` and `/usr/local`.
But I find `caffe2` in `/usr/local/include/` and `/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/`.

My installation process is:
```
> mkdir build && cd build
> cmake -DCUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/local/cudnn-v6.0-for-cuda8.0/include -DCUDNN_LIBRARY=/usr/local/cudnn-v6.0-for-cuda8.0/lib64/libcudnn.so -DUSE_NATIVE_ARCH=ON ..
> sudo make install -j16
```

I try to remove these paths in `$PATH`, `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`, `$PYTHONPATH`, but still failed with the same errors.

I tried both <https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2> and <https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch>, but the same errors.
